cards.flavor_text: [i]Limbo's arbiters observe with amusement the aspirants, and they allow some their freedom. It is only when aspirants try to unite that they intervene.[/i]

cards.rules_text:
When this artifact enters, exile target creature an opponent controls until this artifact leaves the battlefield.

Vigilance
Whenever you surveil, this creature can't be blocked this turn and gets +1/+0 until end of turn for each card put into your graveyard this way.

cards.flavor_text: [i]Limbo is the graveyard of virtue. Your principles shall be tested, and either they will fail or you will.[/i]
[i]Limbo is the graveyard of memory. The endless dusk and the struggle to survive stretch and distort time. Whatever you once remembered, it's probably better to forget.[/i]
[i]Limbo is the graveyard of wealth. Whatever power you held, whatever title you claimed in your last life, you're just another aspirant here.[/i]
[i]Limbo is the graveyard of desire. Something about the sunless sky dulls pleasure and ends passion. All trudge on to the slim passage of freedom.[/i]
[i]Limbo is the graveyard of hope. So many enter. So few leave alive. If you make a friend in Limbo, prepare to betray them — or share a grave.[/i]
